attributes.action: Ban broadcasting tasteless teen pop media into space
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We broadcast thousands of songs / programs everyday of tasteless teen pop media into space. These may one day be received by any extra terrestrial life forms that may exist. These aliens may take offense at our blatant disregard for meaningful communication and venture to our part of the universe and destroy us to stop the flood.

For our safety we should not broadcast anything we would not want back in 5 years ourselves.

Support this petition and stop the threat to our planet.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
